io

Class MultiInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.MultiInputStream

  • public class MultiInputStream
extends Object
    A class that fowards all input received from the main stream to other input streams.
    Author:
    Jacob Glueck

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      A class to forward all data from the main input stream.
